description: Forest Grove Family Retreat – Spacious, Serene & Stylishly Renovated! Nestled into the quiet nature setting of Forest Grove, this turnkey townhome blends modern style w timeless comfort. Inside you’ll find sleek laminate flooring, elegant fixtures, fresh paint, pot lights, crown moulding, & a gorgeous kitchen complete w skylights & bright eating area. Versatile rec room downstairs, cozy living room on main w wood-burning fireplace, full dining area, & massive patio backing to lush green space. Upstairs, spacious bedrooms provide comfort for the whole family, including a lavish primary ensuite. Enjoy complex amenities: squash court, sauna & pool! Prime location across from Forest Grove Elementary & nearby SFU, Skytrain, Parks, Lougheed Mall + HWY #1!
